settings.minititle: A Mattress Made To Last A Lifetime
settings.title:
Remedical® Custom
Comfort Mattress

settings.layercontent: The Top Panel uses Tencel Fabric to provide a soft breathable material, the Quiltec Foam prevents the mattress from sagging, and 3cmm VPF foam increases blood circulation so you wake up every morning feeling refreshed.
60mm of ultra-premium foam sits under the top panel weighing 35kg psm for combined support which relieve's pressure from every organ and muscle in your body.
Working together with the premium comfort foam, this layer uses 9 zones of BHP steel springs and a super firm encasement to keep your neck, shoulders, spine, and hips in perfect alignment.

settings.title:

settings.title:
Customise Your Comfort With 
INTERCHANGEABLE 
Firm Cushions
settings.content:
Partners often differ in their preferences regarding the firmness of their mattresses. The Remedical® Custom Comfort Mattress is designed so you both feel satisfied sleeping.

Choose what firmness you prefer using custom mattress cushions that are easily removable and able to change. If you don't like your first choice, we'll exchange your comfort cushion completely free of charge!

settings.title:
Proven & Tested
To NEVER SAG
settings.content:
You can feel confident you're getting nothing but the best as our high-quality materials are subjected to constant testing and proven to EXCEED both Australian and international standards.

Most mattresses get saggy over time and will lose a lot of height from when you first purchase them. With the Remedical® Custom Comfort Mattress, you're guaranteed only to see 2% of height lost over 10 years.

settings.title:
Sleep Deeply With 
PERFECT Spine Alignment
settings.content:
Your posture while you sleep should be similar to standing, which means a straight spine and minimal pressure on your organs.

Most mattresses use anywhere from 3-7 zone pocket springs, but we use 9 zones. You can now experience an unmatched level of targeted support that cradles every vertebrae of your spine and keeps even your hips in perfect alignment.

settings.title: ZERO Partner Disturbance
settings.content: Each pocket spring compresses independently to prevent movement from disturbing anyone on the bed. You can now sleep with the confidence your partner's movement won't ever wake you up again.

settings.title: Certified Clean, Sustainable, & NON-TOXIC Materials
settings.content:
If you've ever bought a mattress in a box before you're probably aware you need to wait several days to let it air out. Toxic fumes like disocyanates, flame retardants, and polyols can circulate the air while you sleep.

Our mattress is made from the cleanest and greenest materials that are environmentally friendly, promote better health, and prevent the build up of microbes for the ultimate hygiene.

You can sleep confident knowing your mattress is of the highest quality and you aren't breathing in heavy chemicals 8 hours every night.

settings.title: 100% Australian-Made
settings.content:
Australian brands sell many mattresses, but the vast majority are made overseas.

This is the first custom mattress of its kind to include this interchangeable design made with high-quality materials made entirely here in Australia.

Sleep soundly while supporting Australian families and keeping your country's economy strong!

settings.title:
A CUSTOM Mattress Made 
EXCLUSIVELY For You
settings.content:
Most mattresses sit around in a warehouse for months or years before finally being purchased.

When you purchase the Remedical® Custom Comfort Mattress, we make your mattress exclusively for you. Immediately after your purchase, we jump to work and make your custom mattress in as little as 3 days. 

You'll soon have your favourite sleep companion made for the rest of your life.

settings.title: EASY To Order & Unbox
settings.content:
Experimenting with the right mattress is a private experience that can only truly be tried in the privacy of your own home.

We make this process as easy and simple as possible for you. We make your mattress in 3 days using an Australian factory, and then the mattress gets shipped to you in a box.

All you need to do is simply Unbox, Unroll, Unwrap, and Unwind!
